system.description:
Starting at 6th level, you know how to strike in order to disrupt concentration at the expense of your other adept techniques.

Once per turn, when a creature you can see within 60 feet of you casts a spell, you can spend an exertion point to make a Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Insight) against their spell save DC. On a success, you gain the following effects when you take the Attack action against this creature:

  • You gain an expertise dice for those attack rolls.
  • On a hit, the target’s DC for the concentration checks uses your Combat Maneuver DC, or half the damage received, whichever is higher.
  • On a hit, the target has disadvantage on checks made to maintain concentration, but has advantage on checks made to resist effects from your Focus Features (such as @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6ke5eufijnme1uzi]{Stunning Strike}).

These effects last either for one minute, until you choose to end it, or until you use this feature on a different target.

effects.name: Inescapable Interruptions
effects.description: Disadvantage on checks made to maintain concentration, but has advantage on checks made to resist effects from Focus Features.
